attributes.action: Lazy web browsing lay abouts to stop receiving state benefit and get a job (especially Fitlads users)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goevrnment spends far too much money supporting illiterate idle fools to sit on the net using supplied PCs and free web access at the cost to the tax payer

We here by petition that all such users go:getjobs

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
